name: Luxe Velvet Armchair
description: A chic and comfortable armchair upholstered in soft, deep-pile velvet. Features a sturdy wooden frame and elegant brass legs. Available in colors like emerald green, sapphire blue, and charcoal.

reviews.comment: Looks great in my living room

name: Bohemian Jute & Wool Area Rug
description: Hand-woven from natural jute and soft wool, this area rug brings a warm, earthy texture. Its geometric patterns and neutral tones make it versatile for living rooms, bedrooms, or entryways.

name: Minimalist Walnut Coffee Table
description: A solid American walnut coffee table with clean lines and simple design, emphasizing the natural beauty of the wood grain. Perfect for minimalist or contemporary decor.

question: How do I clean my velvet furniture?
answer: For light cleaning, use a soft brush to remove dust. For spills, blot with a clean, dry cloth immediately. For stubborn stains, use a professional cleaning service or fabric-specific solution following product instructions.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be in new, unused condition with all original packaging. Contact customer service with your order number to initiate a return.
